description: > Here's some useful tricks to get you started:
- Prefixing a **`channel ID`** with `#` will mention that channel
- Prefixing a **`user ID`** with `@` will mention that user
- Prefixing **`USERNAME`** with `$` will be replaced with your user/display name
template_default.footer: ðŸ”» Use the buttons down below to get started ðŸ”»
